DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect walk train partial body weight support static ( floor ) dynamic ( treadmill ) surface individual hemiparesis due stroke . For purpose , two training protocol employ three experimental group : G1 walk train partial body weight support static surface G2 walk train partial body weight support dynamic surface
DOC.brief_title: Walking Training With Partial Body Weight Support Static Dynamic Surfaces Stroke Survivers
DOC.criteria: Onesided hemiparesis , No heart disease ( medical clearance participate study ) , No orthopedic impairment / neurological symptom may alter gait , history thrombophlebitis deep vein thrombosis , Ability understand follow verbal command , Can walk alone cane approximately 10 ; Spasticity degree mild moderate affect low limb level classification 0 2 Ashworth spasticity scale modify Heart frequency increase 75 % maximum general instability training may lead risk health training ,
